title: Customized Language Learning Pathway Design: Scrum-Based Collaborative Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Flexible Learning Support and Personal Device Utilization Environment for Working Learners

learning_goals: Learners can generate three or more Learning Situations (LS) for designing personalized language learning pathways
Learners can collaborate with peers using the Scrum methodology to reorganize and share learning materials
Learners can perform self-assessment based on a 5-level evaluation criteria (grammar/vocabulary/pronunciation/fluency/context) in a mobile environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
